reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress cute, comfortable, and flattering, with soft, stretchy material that hugs the body. However, the fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it good while others say it's a bit short. The material quality and tie-back system also get mixed reviews, with some praising the material while others note it's not cotton, and one customer mentions the tie-back is fussy. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everyone needs a little black dress
items.body: one of my favorite dressed, but itâ€™s very short. Material is very soft, it does pick up animal hair quite fast, itâ€™s lightweight but still providing warmth without feeling suffocated. Very comfortable. The waist rope will snatch you and youâ€™ll never wanna take it off- just wear shorts/ tights under! Read more
items.author: Dakota

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute LBD
items.body: Bought this dress for my daughter to wear to work on New Years. She is a hostess and wanted something simple but cute to wear with knee high boots. She loved this dress it compliments her figure well and she was extremely comfortable in it. She loved the long sleeves and the string in the back to give it a corset type look. This is a great dress for the price. Read more
items.author: Erika Nelson

items.author: Abby Baldwin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used it as a Halloween costume but is versatile enough for multiple looks
items.body: I bought this for a Halloween costume (I dressed as Lisa Loeb in her "Stay" video) and it was perfect! It's comfortable and fit well. For my outfit, I paired it with black leggings, black worker boots, and black cats-eye glasses (chef's kiss!). I feel like I will be able to get many uses out of this dress and get several different looks from it. I'll try to upload a picture of Lisa Loeb to show the look because I didn't take a picture of me in it yet...let's see if it's allowed Read more
items.author: D. L. MCDONALD

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do Not Buy!
items.body: I wish I could give this ZERO stars. I bought this with high hopes. In the picture of this dress itâ€™s clearly ribbed material which is what I wanted. When I opened it it was a spandex material with a very ugly over lay of material. I would NOT recommend this purchase to anyone. Material is as thick as as swim suit. I got a size small but it fit like a large. Again I would not buy this product. Read more
items.author: sophie

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
about_this_item:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blackish Green, Short Sleeve_pink, Short Sleeve_black, Short Sleeve_light Purple, Black, Coffee, Short Sleeve_coffee, Short Sleeve_rose Red, Olive, Short Sleeve_light Blue, Pink, Short Sleeve_ Orange, Short Sleeve_ White, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
